column4: can anyone please help me, i have ubuntu hoary version , want to install ndiswrapper for my wireless card but at the make install i get an error, something of Can't find kernel build files in /lib/.... can anyone please tell me what to do :s
ndiswrapper is available as as package
what do yoy mean ? like apt-get .. ?
can you please elaborate ? how is this command apt-get install ndiswrapper ?
i'm running an older version, 5.04 hoary
hoary is the only version i can install on my older p3 laptop, the newer version hangs while installing :(
okay, I guess you don in fact have to compile is, sorry
that isn't easy for a beginner, right ?
no, you'll need to install build-essential, and linux-headers-$(uname -r)
this sounds really confusing, how do i begin with this ? or is this just too much to explain ?
thank you gonna read it now
